Method Detail

decode

public static java.lang.String decode(java.net.URL url)
Decode a URL's text and return a more "readable" form. This is a very simple wrapper that merely hides some exception handling an defaults.

Parameters:
url - a URL.
Returns:
the readable (decoded) form of the URL.

getShortPath

public static java.lang.String getShortPath(java.net.URL url)
Given a URL, come up with a short "file name" derived from it. For example, given the URL "http://example.com/foo/bar/baz.html", return "baz.html". The returned string is not guaranteed to follow any precise semantics, but should be good enough for use in user interface.

Parameters:
url - a URL.
Returns:
the short portion of the path.

joinUrlAndFragment

public static java.net.URL joinUrlAndFragment(java.net.URL url,
                                              java.lang.String fragmentId)
Join a URL and a fragment identifier, and return a new URL

Parameters:
url - a URL.
fragmentId - a fragment identifier.
Returns:
a new URL.

splitUrlAndFragment

public static java.lang.Object[] splitUrlAndFragment(java.net.URL url)
Split a URL into a base and a fragment identifier.

Parameters:
url - a URL.
Returns:
an array of length 2 containing the base URL and a String fragment identifier, in that order.
